channel.title: Bootstrapped episode #78 & #79 with Patrick Pohler
channel.description:
Listen to the episodes: [Part 1](http://bootstrapped.fm/78-patrick-pohler-part-1-on-starting-an-api-based-real-estate-saas/) [Part 2](http://bootstrapped.fm/79-part-2-patrick-pohler-on-starting-an-api-based-real-estate-saas/)
Parts one and two of our conversation with Patrick Pohler (@patpohler ) about his startup Rets Rabbit and his consulting company Anecka. We go deep on MLS real estate data, API’s, competitive risks, SaaS, hiring, consulting, side money vs big money, VR, buying an affiliate website, Farm to Bunker Survival Kits, and more.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. [Sign up today and get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)

item.title: Bootstrapped episode #78 & #79 with Patrick Pohler
item.dc:creator: edtee
item.description:
Just saw this now. Really like what Patrick has done with Rets Rabbit!

I’m working on a real estate product myself that will benefit from integration with MLS data so I’ll reach out to him to see if we can collaborate.

GitHub

etewiah/property_web_builder

property_web_builder - The ultimate Ruby on Rails engine for creating real estate websites

Read full topic
